Trump's unilateral decision by tweet is no way to conduct diplomacy--not only does it undermine the U.S. role as a good-faith arbiter in the region and 50 years of precedent, but the timing is part of a dangerous political game just weeks before Israelis go to the ballot box.

Former Ambassador to Israel @Martin_Indyk is spot on: “Putin will use this as a pretext to justify Russia’s annexation of Crimea. The Israeli right will use it as a pretext for Israel’s annexation of the West Bank. It is a truly gratuitous move by Trump.” https://www.nytimes.com/2019/03/21/us/politics/golan-heights-trump.html …
